| HistoryText             = A duo of Atlantean Sirens whose mystic songs were often employed by [[Old Sharky (Earth-616)|Old Sharky]]. When [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|The Hulk]] was taken in by a local scientist to remove some dangerous magic from their Atlantis section, Sharky enlisted the twins to sing their song which cut through the Hulk's CNS and nearly lulled him to sleep.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 3 9}} But Banner's better half fought through their serenade long enough to gorge on the Black Mash narcotic in order to keep angry and stay awake long enough to defeat the inbred brigands whom the twins worked for.
